name: kmos
description: Collection of input data for KMOS.

properties.name: meta
properties.description: KMOS meta information like author, model name, etc.

properties.name: species
properties.description: List of all species.  Can occupy the sites.  An empth species is represented by a single vacancy in vacuum, i.e. Atoms('X').

properties.name: lattice
properties.description: Atoms entity specifying the lattice structure as well as the cell size.

properties.name: layers
properties.description: Entity defining the layers and associated sites.

properties.name: process
properties.description: List of possible processes with associated reaction rates.

properties.name: process_parameters
properties.description: Process parameters used in the equations for the reaction rates.
